message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DB

This paper is about using domain knowledge to improve query efficiency in content filtering applications. It specifically focuses on using Wikipedia's concept-relatedness information and a domain ontology to produce semantic content classifiers. This topic falls under the sub-categories of Information Retrieval (cs.IR), Computational Linguistics (cs.CL), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), Machine Learning (cs.LG), and Databases (cs.DB).
